key.name: cols
key.description: Default number of columns for a custom grid size

key.name: rows
key.description: Default number of columns for a custom grid size

key.name: basictiling
key.description: Enable basic quarter / half tiling shortcuts

key.name: usegeneralanimation
key.description: Make general animation settings overrule Shuffler settings

key.name: customgridtiling
key.description: Enable tiling, resizing and moving shortcuts to be used in a custom grid size

key.name: swapgeometry
key.summary: Swap window geometry between windows on grid when jumping
key.description: If a window jumps to another position where already is another window, swap window size and position

key.name: runlayouts
key.description: Enable Shuffler's feature to setup a setup a combination of windows in a layout

key.name: windowrules
key.summary: Whether to use window rules or not
key.description: This setting is to enable to set position, size and display rules for wm classes

key.name: stickyneighbors
key.description: When using Resize, also resize adjacent opposite window(s)

key.name: softmove
key.summary: Use animation on xy move and xy tile actions
key.description: When a window is moved by tiling or move, use smooth transition

key.name: showwarning
key.summary: Show a warning on incorrect target window size
key.description: On resizing or moving windows, show a warning if targeted window size is below minimum window size

key.name: runshuffler
key.description: Run the daemon to be able to use shortcuts and cli options of Window Shuffler

key.name: runshufflergui
key.description: Run the daemon to be able to use the grid gui on top of the cli options of Window Shuffler

key.name: newwindowaction
key.summary: Command to run on creation of new windows
key.description: On creation of a new window, run a command. This setting is not available in Shuffler control. Window rules should be off to prevent clashing actions

key.name: closedwindowaction
key.summary: Comaand to run on closing windows
key.description: On closure of a window, run a command. This setting is not available in Shuffler control

key.name: greyshade
key.description: The grey shade of the grid buttons, 0 is black, 100 is white

key.name: marginleft
key.description: The margin that Shuffler should keep to the left side of the monitor

key.name: marginright
key.description: The margin that Shuffler should keep to the right side of the monitor

key.name: roundposmaxcols
key.description: How many columns round_position should consider when optimizing window position

key.name: roundposmaxrows
key.description: How many rows round_position should consider when optimizing window position

key.name: margintop
key.description: The margin that Shuffler should keep to the top of the monitor

key.name: marginbottom
key.description: The margin that Shuffler should keep to the bottom of the monitor

key.name: padding
key.description: The padding that Shuffler should keep between grid cells
